title: Hanstone and Quartz fonts
content:
Hello! Can someone please help me figure out these font (they might be the same). Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724124118/http:/typophile.com/files/image_126.jpg) | 27.42 KB |
author: Primehunter

comments.content:
It's the same font: **[Arrow](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724124118/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Image-Club-Graphics&ffam=Arrow%20-%20Regular&fid=a2fb81ea6d25f3120df1b6370e18b6fd&fsize=60&text=HanStone%20Fine%20Quartz%20Surfaces&wrap=2)** by Image Club Graphics [1992]  
You can also find an interesting discussion about Arrow here:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/85668](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724124118/http:/typophile.com/node/85668 "http://typophile.com/node/85668")
The only legitimate source of Arrow, Fivos, is [Treacyfaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724124118/http:/www.treacyfaces.com/TFArrow_interiors.php).

Thanks Mike, Mark Simonson mentions that on the link to Typophile thread I gave above:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/85668](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724124118/http:/typophile.com/node/85668 "http://typophile.com/node/85668")
